Chased Non-Moving Construction Joints & Shrinkage Cracks: Prime chased sides using SILCOR Primer BS. Allow to cure tack free. Gun SILCOR LM PU Sealant to primed chase within 24 hours of priming. Tool to a smooth concave finish. Allow sealant to cure a minimum 24 hours.
CFC & Cement Composite Sheets Joints: Gun SILCOR LM PU Sealant to joint and tool to a smooth concave finish. Allow sealant to cure a minimum 24 hours.
